posts.post_content: Great card Kevin. I added a pic so I didn't have to tilt my head so much when looking at it. Good luck with it. I am sure it will find a good home.
Thanks Leon.  I actually tried to rotate the original pictures, but did not know how to do it.
I find it very interesting that P&S misspelled Cincinnati on the card.

[quote name="terjung" post=762107]I find it very interesting that P&S misspelled Cincinnati on the card.[/QUOTE]

You can tell Barry didn't work there!

Cincinnati is misspelled about as much as any city around...all those double letters.:)

It has one "a", one "t", two "c", three "n", and three "i", and people typically add a double letter or spell it "Cincinatti." It's a very tough word.

Kevin,

That is a fantastic card, out of my ballpark though. Too bad prices from 1869 won't work......$5.00 for 100 sounds like a great deal.  Good luck with the sale.

RC
